Filter Multiple Concept Strip Columns

Source: R/format.R
filter_at_all_strip.Rd

This function performs the same style of filtering as filter_strip over multiple columns.

filter_at_all_strip(data, strip_cols, ...)

Arguments

data

Dataframe
...

Filter arguments passed to the dplyr filter function using the base Concept Table fields.
merge_cols

Character vector of column names to filter
all

Equivalent to the `all_vars()` variable predicate in the Tidyverse system. If TRUE, all `merge_cols` are filtered for. If FALSE, the equivalent to `any_vars()` is performed. Default: TRUE

Value

A tibble.

See also

filterStrip select,select_all,bind,filter_all,filter,distinct separate_rows normalize_all_to_na

Examples

library(tidyverse)
library(chariot)

test_data <-
        queryAthena("SELECT * FROM omop_vocabulary.concept ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 20;",
                    cache_only = TRUE)

#> [2020-12-12 17:25:13]	Connecting using PostgreSQL driver
#> ✓ Connection is open
#> ✓ Connection is JDBC Connection

#> [2020-12-12 17:25:13]	Cached resultset found...
#> [2020-12-12 17:25:13]	Postgres connection closed

merge_strip(data = test_data,
            into = "concept")

merge_strip(data = test_data,
            into = "concept",
            vocabulary_id,
            concept_class_id)

test_output <- merge_strip(data = test_data,
                        into = "concept") %>%
                dplyr::select(-concept_id)

# Filter at a Strip Column
filter_strip(test_output,
             strip_col = concept,
             vocabulary_id %in% c("RxNorm"))

#> # A tibble: 2 x 1
#>   concept                                                                       
#>   <chr>                                                                         
#> 1 [V] [S] 41014174 ethylene glycol 0.106 MG/MG [RxNorm Extension OMOP2212136] […
#> 2 [V] [S] 36060797 febuxostat 80 MG Oral Tablet by Dr Reddy's [RxNorm Extension…

# Filter at more than 1 Strip Column
test_data <-
        queryAthena("SELECT * FROM omop_vocabulary.concept ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 10;",
                    cache_only = TRUE) %>%
        merge_strip(into = "concept")

#> [2020-12-12 17:25:14]	Connecting using PostgreSQL driver
#> ✓ Connection is open
#> ✓ Connection is JDBC Connection
#> [2020-12-12 17:25:14]	Loading Cache...
#> [2020-12-12 17:25:14]	Cached SQL: SELECT * FROM omop_vocabulary.concept ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 10;
#> [2020-12-12 17:25:14]	Cached resultset found...
#> [2020-12-12 17:25:14]	Postgres connection closed

test_data <-
        dplyr::bind_cols(test_data %>%
                                 rubix::randomize() %>%
                                 dplyr::select(concept_a = concept),
                         test_data %>%
                                 rubix::randomize() %>%
                                 dplyr::select(concept_b = concept))

filter_at_all_strip(data = test_data,
                strip_cols = c("concept_a",
                               "concept_b"),
                all = TRUE,
                vocabulary_id %in% c("RxNorm"))

#> # A tibble: 1 x 2
#>   concept_a                               concept_b                             
#>   <chr>                                   <chr>                                 
#> 1 [V] [S] 36069843 clindamycin 12 MG/ML … [V] [S] 21154268 rabeprazole 20 MG De…

filter_at_any_strip(data = test_data,
                    strip_cols = c("concept_a",
                                   "concept_b"),
                    all = TRUE,
                    vocabulary_id %in% c("RxNorm"))

#> # A tibble: 3 x 2
#>   concept_a                               concept_b                             
#>   <chr>                                   <chr>                                 
#> 1 [V] [S] 36069843 clindamycin 12 MG/ML … [V] [S] 21154268 rabeprazole 20 MG De…
#> 2 [V] [S] 21154268 rabeprazole 20 MG Del… [V] [C] 36661255 PRKAR1A gene deletio…
#> 3 [V] [S] 41089514 terbinafine 250 MG Or… [V] [S] 36069843 clindamycin 12 MG/ML…
